definition: what course to follow/what path to take

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor

sentences.english: What do we do in times of moral upheaval?
sentences.chinese: 在道德淪亡的時代，我們該何去何從？

sentences.english: In this critical time of a toss-up, she will be where to go?
sentences.chinese: 在這難以取捨的關鍵時刻，她將何去何從？

sentences.english: If a face could launch a thousand ships, then where am I go ?
sentences.chinese: 倘若花容能揚起千艘船隻，我將何去何從？

sentences.english: James's destination has been the subject of ramped-up speculation for two years.
sentences.chinese: 過去兩年中詹姆斯將何去何從一直是人們猜測的中心。

sentences.english: Three generations. Where are they heading?
Had this been a real life you would have been instructed where to go and what to do.
sentences.chinese: 你要是真能直麪人生，你便早會被告知何去何從。

sentences.english: Cause this battle between sisters confidential director leaves GongJin again?
sentences.chinese: 引起姐妹之間這場廝殺的保密處長葉公瑾又何去何從？

sentences.english: Do you think that the proliferation of standards may be confusing people about where to go?
sentences.chinese: 您認爲標準的增長會使人們對何去何從感到困惑嗎？

sentences.english: Where then does that pantomime villain, globalisation, fit in?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，“全球化”這個反面角色又該何去何從呢？

sentences.english: But who could tame the tide away and tell it where to go?
sentences.chinese: 而誰又能平復暗潮，告訴它何去何從？

sentences.english: And now you do. The question now is, where are you gonna go from here?
sentences.chinese: 現在你知道了阿。接下來的問題是你將要何去何從？

sentences.english: So what does an entrepreneur do when caught in this predicament?
sentences.chinese: 一旦遭遇這種困境，企業家該何去何從？

sentences.english: What will they do when the music stops?
sentences.chinese: 樂聲戛然而止時，他們又將何去何從？

sentences.english: So where will we all be, language-wise, ten years from now?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，十年後我們的語言將何去何從？

sentences.english: Where will all the martyrs go when the virus cures itself?
sentences.chinese: 當病毒治癒着它自己時，所有那些殉難者何去何從？

sentences.english: What would they do if this child queen bestowed it on them?
sentences.chinese: 若小女王將自由賜予了他們他們又何去何從？

definition: not knowing which course to follow (idiom); at a loss what to do
things turn out contrary to the way one wishes (idiom)
to worry/to fret/to be anxious/to become sad
to leave a place where some event is taking place/(of an actor) to exit/(sports) to leave the field/(of an audience) to leave
not knowing anything at all (idiom); completely ignorant/without an inkling
tossed about by the wind and rain (idiom)/(of a situation) unstable
to follow the track of an overturned cart/to repeat a disastrous policy
lit. to have one's hands bound and be unable to do anything about it (idiom); fig. helpless in the face of a crisis
